description:
Tree works subject to a Tree Preservation Order.

T1 - T113 of TPO (No 407) 2009.

Front of Molton House
T1	Norway maple 	30% Crown reduction
T2	Cherry	          	Reshape (30 Crown reduction)
T3	Whitebeam		Cutback over highway & reduce by 30%
T4	Cherry		20% Crown reduction

Front of Venn House.
T5	Hawthorn	         	Fell & Replace
T6	Alder	                    	30% Crown reduction

Side of Venn House   
T7	Hawthorn		Lift to 2M over highway

Corner at front NHS clinic
T8	Cherry	       	Reduce to previous points

Rear of Amory House,
T10	Ash	                  	Cut back to previous points
T11	Ash	                	Cut back to previous points
T13	Cherry	           Cut back to previous points
T16	Ash	                	Cut back to previous points
T17	Cherry	    	Cut back to previous points
T18	Portuguese Laurel	40% Crown reduction

Rear of Aldrick House,
T19	Ash		          	15% Crown Reduction
T20	Red Oak		Cut back to previous points
T21	Ash		          	Cut back to previous points
T22	Ash	             	Cut back to previous points

Side of Aldrick House,
T23	Ash	            	Cut back to previous points

Front of Aldrick House,
T25	Norway maple	10% crown thin
T26	Norway maple	10% crown thin
T27	Cherry	   	10% Crown Thin
T28	Cherry	           Lift to 6M, 10% crown thin, Cut back to clear highway.

Front of Amory House,
T29	Cherry	   	Cut back to clear property by 2M, Cut back to clear highway 
T32	Silver Birch	   	Clear/remove Dead Wood

Side of Thurston House,
T33	Ash	             	10% Thin, Cut back to clear property  2M.

Rear of Adrian House,
T37	Norway maple	Cut back to clear Street Light  (N/A)
T40	Alder	            	Lift to 6M & clear public highway.

Front of Crispe House,
T46	Cherry		30% crown Reduction, 10% Crown thin

Front of Jocelin House,
T54	Sycamore		Cut back to previous points

Front of Jocelin House,
T55	Cherry		Cut back to previous points
T57	Bird Cherry		Cut back to previous points
T58	Maple
decision_conditions: The council expects to see a replacement trees planted in a location close to where T5, T108 and T110 will be removed from. The species and size is to be agreed with the Tree Preservation Officer prior to planting. Replacement tree is be planted within one planting season.
